as_a: Data steward of a patient registry
I_would_like_to: be guided towards good FAIR implementation choices for my data
such_that_I_can: make my data efficiently useable in combination with other FAIR resources in automated scenarios
sum: As a Data steward of a patient registry I would like to be guided towards good FAIR implementation choices for my data such that I can make my data efficiently useable in combination with other FAIR resources in automated scenarios.
